column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Random spirit # 1 says : " The all - powerful spirits are battling ! "
#Text=Random spirit # 2 says : " They 're gon na wipe out the entire valley ! "
#Text=Wan says : " Stop , or you 'll destroy everything ! "
#Text=Raava says : " This does n't concern you , human ! "
#Text=Wan says : " It does when the lives of spirits and animals are in danger . "
#Text=Vaatu says : " If you 're a friend to spirits , then use your fire to help me break free . "
#Text=Raava says : " Do n't involve the human .
#Text=She has tormented me for ten thousand years .
#Text=" Wan says : " Ten thousand years ?
#Text=Let him go !
#Text=" Vaatu says : " Thank you , human .
#Text=You have performed a great service for the spirits .
#Text=" Raava says : " Do you realize what you 've done ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Yeah , I helped a spirit who was being bullied by you .
#Text=" Raava says : " You are gravely mistaken .
#Text=I was keeping him under control .
#Text=" Wan says : " And what gives you the right ?
#Text=" Raava says : " You do n't even know who I am , do you ?
#Text=" Wan says : " Should I ?
#Text=" Raava says : " Yes .
#Text=My name is Raava .
#Text=That spirit you freed is Vaatu .
#Text=He is the force of darkness and chaos .
#Text=I am the force of light and peace .
#Text=Since the beginning of time , we have battled over the fate of this world .
#Text=And for the past ten thousand years , I have kept darkness under control and the world in balance , until you came along .
#Text=" Wan says : " So , by freeing Vaatu , I let chaos into the world ?
#Text=" Raava says : " Precisely .
#Text=The human and spirit realms are headed toward annihilation , and it 's all your fault .
#Text=" Korra says : " Raava .
#Text=I found you .
#Text="
